Set.Text: Bountiful City-States
Bountiful City-States
We are a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] people and we can help accelerate your civilization's [ICON_FOOD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Growth[ENDCOLOR].
A befriended [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] City-State will boost the [ICON_FOOD] Food of your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital when Friends, and all of your cities when Allies.

As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they will export Food to your empire (+{1_NumCapitalFood}[ICON_FOOD]in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, +{2_NumCitiesFood}[ICON_FOOD]in all other Cities).

As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they now make large Food exports to your empire (additional +{1_NumCapitalFood}[ICON_FOOD]in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, +{2_NumCitiesFood}[ICON_FOOD]in all other Cities).

A befriended [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Borderlander[ENDCOLOR] City-State will provide you occasional gifts of advanced military units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]They know the secrets of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{@1_UniqueUnitName}[ENDCOLOR]. If you are their Ally and have researched {@2_PrereqTech}, they will provide that unit as their gift.
A befriended [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Borderlander[ENDCOLOR] City-State will provide you occasional gifts of advanced military units.
As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Borderlander[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they will regularly give you military Units. Sometimes they will give you Unique Units that you normally would not have access to.
Borderlander City-States
We are of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Borderlander[ENDCOLOR] people and we can increase the strength of your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Army[ENDCOLOR].
Clicking this will tell the Borderlander City State to either stop or resume gifting Units to you.

A befriended [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Borderlander[ENDCOLOR] City-State will provide you occasional gifts of advanced military units. They will also make requests that are more militaristic in nature (e.g. destroying a Barbarian Encampment, or capturing a neighboring City-State).
As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Borderlander[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they will occasionally give you military Units.
As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Militaristic[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they will regularly give you military Units.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]United Front[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Borderlander city states grant units twice as often when you are at war with a common foe.
We are an [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Enlightened[ENDCOLOR] people and we can help nurture your religious traditions.
A befriended [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Enlightened[ENDCOLOR] City-State will increase your [ICON_PEACE] Faith, allowing you to empower your religion with new beliefs and units.
As an [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Enlightened[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they share their knowledge of rituals with you! (+{1_NumFaith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith per turn)
As an [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Enlightened[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they give you their most treasured religious relics! (+{1_NumFaith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith per turn)
Jewelry is only available through a Prosperous City-State.
Porcelain is only available through a Prosperous City-State.
Prosperous City-States
We are a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Prosperous[ENDCOLOR] people and we have many luxuries that can make your citizens happy.

A befriended [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Prosperous[ENDCOLOR] City-State will provide extra [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in your empire, and manufactures special luxury resources which cannot be acquired any other way.
As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Prosperous[ENDCOLOR] City-State, their markets offer exotic goods to your people! (+{1_NumHappiness} [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness)
